name: TimelineSchedule
desc: A type that provides a sequence of dates for use as a schedule.

items.name: static var animation: AnimationTimelineSchedule
items.desc: A pausable schedule of dates updating at a frequency no more quickly than the provided interval.

items.name: static func animation(minimumInterval: Double?, paused: Bool) -> AnimationTimelineSchedule
items.desc: A pausable schedule of dates updating at a frequency no more quickly than the provided interval.

items.name: static var everyMinute: EveryMinuteTimelineSchedule
items.desc: A schedule for updating a timeline view at the start of every minute.

items.name: static func explicit<S>(S) -> ExplicitTimelineSchedule<S>
items.desc: A schedule for updating a timeline view at explicit points in time.

items.name: static func periodic(from: Date, by: TimeInterval) -> PeriodicTimelineSchedule
items.desc: A schedule for updating a timeline view at regular intervals.

items.name: func entries(from: Date, mode: Self.Mode) -> Self.Entries
items.desc: Provides a sequence of dates starting around a given date.

items.name: associatedtype Entries : Sequence
items.desc: The sequence of dates within a schedule.

items.name: typealias Mode
items.desc: An alias for the timeline schedule update mode.

items.name: enum TimelineScheduleMode
items.desc: A mode of operation for timeline schedule updates.

items.name: struct AnimationTimelineSchedule
items.desc: A pausable schedule of dates updating at a frequency no more quickly than the provided interval.

items.name: struct EveryMinuteTimelineSchedule
items.desc: A schedule for updating a timeline view at the start of every minute.

items.name: struct ExplicitTimelineSchedule
items.desc: A schedule for updating a timeline view at explicit points in time.

items.name: struct PeriodicTimelineSchedule
items.desc: A schedule for updating a timeline view at regular intervals.
